Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Kempinski Hotel Moika 22, you'll be centrally located in St. Petersburg, steps from Alexander Pushkin Museum and Memorial Apartment and minutes from Saint Petersburg Printing Museum. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Museum of Soviet Arcade Games and Anna Akhmatova Literary and Memorial Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 200 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an attached winery, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in St. Petersburg? This hotel has 2153 square feet (200 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and RV/bus/truck parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Kempinski Hotel Moika 22, you'll be centrally located in St. Petersburg, steps from Alexander Pushkin Museum and Memorial Apartment and minutes from Saint Petersburg Printing Museum. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Museum of Soviet Arcade Games and Anna Akhmatova Literary and Memorial Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Alexander Pushkin Museum and Memorial Apartment - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Saint Petersburg Printing Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Museum of Soviet Arcade Games - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Anna Akhmatova Literary and Memorial Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palace Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Alexander Column - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Arkady Raykin Variety Theater - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Cigar Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Museum of Bladed Weapons - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
State Hermitage Museum and Winter Palace - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Church of the Savior on the Spilled Blood - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
City Sculpture Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Mussorgsky Opera and Ballet Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of the History of Political Police - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Mikhailovsky Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Kempinski Hotel Moika 22 is St. Petersburg (LED-Pulkovo) - 16 km / 10 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subject to 100% charge. Rates are not valid during event such as world economic forum and g20 summit. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. “All people with citizenship other than Russian are required to be registered with local immigration authorities and should pay for it the local registration service fee 300 RUB per person / per stay directly to the hotel upon check in”

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
